title: Crows Gaiden: Housenka - The Beginning of Housen
original_name: クローズ外伝 鳳仙花 the beginning of HOUSEN
sinopse:
The manga tells the origins of Housen Academy, a rival of the strongest delinquent school Suzuran. The story takes place one year before the school's founding and focuses on Butta Terakado.

(Source: Crows x Worst Wiki)
